CustomField.description:
Total sum of related defending and open opportunity records. This sum is performed and mapped by the 360 custom setting.
Source field = C360_Sum_of_Open_Defending_Business__c.
Criteria for open defending business is opportunity type = defending and stage is not closed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sum of amount for all related open opportunities.
CustomField.label: Open Defending Business Opportunities
